text: The 1875 Wesleyan Methodists football team represented Wesleyan University during the 1875 college football season. The team lost its only game to Yale. They lost 6–0 in a twenty-per-side game. ==References== Wesleyan Category:Wesleyan Cardinals football seasons Category:College football winless seasons Wesleyan Methodists football
title: 1875 Wesleyan Methodists football team
